    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    ActivityWebSocketHandler
    WebSocket handler for managing WebSocket connections and broadcasting messages to all connected clients.
    Configuration
    Represents the configuration settings for the ticketing system.
    ConfigurationController
    REST controller for managing configuration-related operations in the ticketing system.
    ConfigurationService
    Service class responsible for managing the configuration and simulation of the ticketing system.
    Customer
    Represents a customer in the ticketing system who retrieves tickets.
    GlobalCorsConfig
    Configuration class to enable CORS for the application.
    InputValidation
    Utility class for validating input configurations.
    Logger
    Utility class for logging messages to a file.
    ServletInitializer
    Servlet initializer for deploying the Spring Boot application in a traditional servlet container.
    Ticket
    Represents a ticket in the ticketing system.
    TicketingSystemApplication
    Entry point for the Ticketing System application.
    TicketPool
    Manages the pool of tickets in the ticketing system.
    Vendor
    Represents a vendor in the ticketing system who is responsible for releasing tickets.
    WebSocketConfig
    Configures WebSocket support for the application.
